::WindRider::
WindRider watched Battera walk out the hatch. He felt
like a fool and a coward. He would make it up to her. 
He turned to Primal Prime. "So", he said with a hint
of sarcasm in his voice, "explain to me how you came
to find out that you're 'Optimus Prime'?"
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She unwrapped her wings and folded them back
> reveiling her slender 
> figure.  She took his hand, but still looked at the
> floor.
> "No appology nessassary. I understand."
> She turned and looked at the hatch.  She walked over
> and went through 
> the hatch.  
> 
> She stood outside looking up at the sky.  Tears ran
> down her face. 
> She was letting her fear go.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > WindRider was ashamed of himself. Ashamed that
> while a
> > lady bot was in danger all he could do was stand
> there
> > like a stupid drone.He offered Battera his hand.
> > "I-I'm sorry", he stammered. "I should have come
> to
> > your defense instead of doing nothing. Im a
> scientist
> > and an explorer,and Im not used to being in a
> combat
> > zone.I'm not built for war."
> 
> 
>
